iana.template_text:
To: iana <iana&ISI.EDU>
From: John Wolfe <John_Wolfe.VIVO&vivo.com>
Date: 29 Jan 96 14:52:11 EDT
Subject: Registration of new Media Type content-type/subtype

MIME type name: video
MIME subtype name: vnd.vivo

Required parameters: none

Optional parameters: none

Encoding considerations: Vivo video is binary data.  Original 
file format will be created under Windows '95.  When this format 
moves to the Macintosh, videos will be encoded as a single-fork 
video file.

Security considerations: None

Published specification: Proprietary format used by products from 
Vivo Software.  For more information, please contact Vivo Software, 
411 Waverley Oaks Road, Waltham, MA, USA (1-617-899-8900).

Vivo Software, Inc.
411 Waverley oaks Road
Waltham, MA 02154-8414
1-617-899-8900

Contact-info: John Wolfe (wolfe&vivo.com)
